channel.title: How do i make a donor zone just for donors?
channel.description:
i can make a donor zone i need to know how to make it just for donaters
also
i need to know how to make a donor rank?

item.title: How do i make a donor zone just for donors?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

if im correct, a donator token is preset in ALL deltascapes nowadays, just look through it and you’ll find something like donator = 0 in char files, and it should be like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donator") && donator == 1) { triggerTele(####, ####, #); sM("Welcome to the Donator zone"); }
And i THINK there is also a command called “add” in most deltascape sources that makes your donator token 1, if there isnt, just use the search button or rip it off another source, and your golden,
replace the #### with the X and Y coords though
p.donator would be if you are using it against someone, example in a jail command, p.player or something for example, it would say p.player and it teles them to the jail zone, so thats kind of directing it to a target if you know what i mean, but im not sure, i might be confusing it with something else…
oh, and if the command doesnt work, just put another closing parenthesis before the first bracket.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a donor zone just for donors?

item.title: How do i make a donor zone just for donors?
item.dc:creator: @valintina valintina
item.description:
@valintina wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:375899”]I assume you are using a Delta base, so;

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donator") && playerRights == #) { triggerTele(####, ####, #); sM("Welcome to the Donator zone"); }[/quote]

I’m sure its && p.donator == 1) or anything like that O.o

Read full topic
